conbody.p: The contracting officer administering the contract must obtain a contractor DoDAAC (see DAFMAN 23-230, Maintaining Air Force DoD Activity Address Codes (DoDAAC)) for contracts that furnish Government property or authorize requisition from a Government supply source. The contracting officer administering the contract must provide the DoDAAC to the program management office/requiring activity to facilitate the shipment of government furnished property. The Purpose Code Management module contained within Procurement Integrated Enterprise Environment (PIEE) must be used to:
(a) Obtain the existing DoDAAC or submit a new DoDAAC request for all contracts awarded;
(c) Initiate contractor DoDAAC deletion when the contract is physically complete, unless the DoDAAC covers other active contracts; and,
(d) Validate contractor DoDAACs in accordance with DAFMAN 23-230, paragraph 4.2.
